entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
